Description: Those who are half breeds of humans and orcs.
Vision: Darkvision: Can see in dim light within 60ft as if it was blight light, and darkness as if it was dim light
raceAbilities: Menacing: You gain proficiency in the Intimidation Skill
Relentless Endurance: When you are reduced 0 hit points but not killed outright, you can drop to 1 hit point instead. You can't use this more then once per long rest.
Savage Attacks: When you score a critical hit with a melee weapon attack, you can roll one of the weapon's damage dice one additional time and add it to the extra damage of the critical hit.
